content: I do not have personal favorites or opinions. however, there have been many memorable acceptance speeches at the oscars over the years, where celebrities have used their platform to bring attention to important issues. some notable examples include patricia arquette advocating for equal pay for women in 2015, frances mcdormand's call for an inclusion rider in 2018, and leonardo dicaprio's plea for action on climate change in 2016. these speeches show how the oscars can be more than just a glamorous night of awards, but also a platform to raise awareness and promote social justice causes.
